panels.description: Number of nodes indexer is connected to

targets.query: SELECT count("count") FROM (SELECT count("request-MutationStage-CompletedTasks.Value") FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

panels.title: Nodes (Unique JMX Trends)

panels.description: This graph shows the heap memory used by each cassandra node

targets.query: SELECT "heapMemoryUsage.used" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'jvm' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Heap Memory Used

panels.description: This graph shows the heap memory committed by each cassandra node

targets.query: SELECT "heapMemoryUsage.committed" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'jvm' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Heap Memory Commited

targets.query: SELECT "gc-ConcurrentMarkSweep.CollectionTime" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'jvm' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "gc-ConcurrentMarkSweep.CollectionTime" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'jvm' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

alert.name: Cassandra- increase in OS CPU Average Load

panels.description: This graph shows the heap memory used by each cassandra node

targets.query: SELECT "systemLoadAverage" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE  "class" = 'os' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: OS CPU Average Load

panels.description: This graph shows the threads used by each cassandra node

targets.query: SELECT "thread" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'jvm' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Thread Count

panels.description: 99th Percentile Write Latency across all column families

targets.query: SELECT sum("WriteLatency.OneMinuteRate") FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ColumnFamily' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Total Writes for cluster - per second

targets.query: SELECT "WriteLatency.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ColumnFamily' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

alert.message: To Fix this alert check the dashboard for the mutation graphs to see if a node is down
alert.name: Cassandra- increase in Write Latency

panels.description: 99th Percentile Write Latency across all column families

targets.query: SELECT "WriteLatency.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ColumnFamily' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Write Latency - 99th Percentile

targets.query: SELECT "Write-ALL-Failures.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ClientRequest' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.description: 99th Percentile Write Latency across all column families

targets.query: SELECT sum("ReadLatency.OneMinuteRate") FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ColumnFamily' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Total Reads for cluster - per second

targets.query: SELECT "ReadLatency.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ColumnFamily' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.description: 99th Percentile Write Latency across all column families

targets.query: SELECT "ReadLatency.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ColumnFamily' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Read Latency - 99th Percentile

targets.query: SELECT "Read-ALL-Failures.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ClientRequest' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.description: This graph shows the disk usage of each cassandra node

targets.query: SELECT sum("Load.Count") FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Total Disk Usage for cluster

panels.description: This graph shows the disk usage of each cassandra node

targets.query: SELECT "Load.Count" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Total Disk Usage per host

panels.description: This graph shows the disk used by commit logs in  each cassandra node

targets.query: SELECT "TotalCommitLogSize.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'CommitLog' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Total Commitlog Size

panels.description: The Total number of bytes compacted by the cluster

targets.query: SELECT "BytesCompacted.Count" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'Compaction' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Total Compacted Bytes

panels.description: The Number of clients connected to this node

targets.query: SELECT "connectedNativeClients.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'Client' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Connected Clients

alert.name: Cassandra- increase in Mutation Stage Pool

targets.query: SELECT "request-MutationStage-PendingTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "request-MutationStage-CurrentlyBlockedTasks.Count" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "request-MutationStage-ActiveTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "request-ReadStage-PendingTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

SELECT "request-ReadStage-ActiveTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "internal-CompactionExecutor-PendingTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "internal-CompactionExecutor-TotalBlockedTasks.Count" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "internal-CompactionExecutor-ActiveTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "internal-HintsDispatcher-PendingTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "internal-HintsDispatcher-CurrentlyBlockedTasks.Count" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "internal-HintsDispatcher-ActiveTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "request-MutationStage-CompletedTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "request-ReadStage-CompletedTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "internal-CompactionExecutor-CompletedTasks.Value" FROM "haystack.datastore.cassandra" WHERE "class" = 'ThreadPools' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
